tiles.name: crimsonwing_mesa
tiles.description: A high mesa overlooking the scrubland, favored by Crimsonwings for nesting and strategic advantage.

tiles.name: sagebrush_plains_east
tiles.description: Expansive plains dominated by sagebrush, providing cover for small creatures and foraging opportunities.

tiles.name: dusty_ravine
tiles.description: A deep ravine carved by wind and erosion, offering shelter from the elements and a hidden pathway.

tiles.name: abandoned_mining_outpost
tiles.description: A derelict outpost, a relic of the city's expansion, now haunted by memories and scavenging birds.

tiles.name: irradiated_wastelands
tiles.description: Lands rendered desolate by toxic runoffs, a testament to the city's destructive practices; few dare to venture here.

tiles.name: scavenger_market_perimeter
tiles.description: The outer reaches of the sprawling market where scavengers sell their reclaimed goods.

tiles.name: scrubland_farms_suburb
tiles.description: A network of small, family-owned farms struggling to survive amidst the encroaching city sprawl.

tiles.name: industrial_outskirts
tiles.description: A gritty landscape of factories, warehouses, and refineries, churning out the city's needs at a cost.

tiles.name: highway_connector_east
tiles.description: A major highway connecting the city center to the eastern suburbs, a constant stream of automated vehicles.

tiles.name: the_gilded_spires
tiles.description: A district of opulent skyscrapers, the heart of corporate power and extravagant wealth, barely visible from scrubland.

tiles.name: arid_mesa_foothills
tiles.description: The rocky foothills of the Crimsonwing Mesa, where hardy shrubs cling to the slopes.

tiles.name: sagebrush_plains_west
tiles.description: The Western expanse of the Sagebrush Plains, known for its occasional flash floods.

tiles.name: joshua_tree_grove
tiles.description: A protected grove of ancient Joshua trees, a reminder of the scrubland's past glory.

tiles.name: collapsed_skyway_section
tiles.description: A crumbling section of a once-grand skyway, a hazardous reminder of failed infrastructure projects.

tiles.name: the_slag_heaps
tiles.description: Towering slag heaps, a toxic legacy of mining operations, where only the toughest scavengers dare to tread.

tiles.name: scavenger_market_center
tiles.description: The bustling heart of the market, a chaotic mix of vendors, traders, and curious onlookers.

tiles.name: suburban_solar_fields
tiles.description: Vast solar fields providing energy to the city, replacing the natural landscape with rows of panels.

tiles.name: industrial_canal_district
tiles.description: A network of canals used for transporting industrial materials, often polluted and dangerous.

tiles.name: the_gridlocked_bypass
tiles.description: A constantly congested bypass around the city, choked with traffic and exhaust fumes.

tiles.name: corporate_plaza_district
tiles.description: A district dominated by gleaming corporate headquarters, symbols of wealth and influence.

tiles.name: scrubland_canyons
tiles.description: A network of narrow canyons, home to elusive creatures and hidden springs.

tiles.name: abandoned_reservoir_site
tiles.description: A dried-up reservoir, a stark reminder of the city's water shortages and mismanagement.

tiles.name: scrubland_clearing_joshua_tree
tiles.description: The neutral ground marked by the gnarled Joshua tree, a meeting place for avian clans, like KiraKira's, amidst the sagebrush.

tiles.name: broken_aqueduct_section
tiles.description: A ruined section of an old aqueduct, a testament to the city's constant need for resources.

tiles.name: toxic_filtration_plant
tiles.description: A facility struggling to clean up the city's toxic waste, releasing foul odors into the surrounding area.

tiles.name: scavenger_guild_hall
tiles.description: The headquarters of the Scavenger's Guild, a powerful organization that controls the flow of salvaged goods.

tiles.name: automated_farm_complex
tiles.description: A massive automated farming complex, providing a portion of the city's food supply.

tiles.name: industrial_drone_depot
tiles.description: A storage and maintenance facility for industrial drones, buzzing with activity and heavy machinery.

tiles.name: orbital_freight_terminal
tiles.description: The district surrounding a key Orbital Freight Terminal where goods are delivered from space.

tiles.name: residential_spire_bottom
tiles.description: The lower residential tiers of the city's tallest spires, densely populated and vertically-oriented.

tiles.name: wind_turbine_valley
tiles.description: A valley filled with towering wind turbines, harnessing the power of the desert winds.

tiles.name: dry_riverbed_crossing
tiles.description: A dry riverbed that occasionally floods during heavy rains, a treacherous path for travelers.

tiles.name: ancient_avian_burial_grounds
tiles.description: A sacred burial ground for the ancestors of the avian clans, a place of respect and remembrance.

tiles.name: water_rationing_checkpoint
tiles.description: A heavily guarded checkpoint where water is strictly rationed to the population.

tiles.name: landfill_methane_collector
tiles.description: A network of collectors extracting methane gas from the city's vast landfill.

tiles.name: scavenger_training_grounds
tiles.description: A training area where aspiring scavengers learn the skills needed to survive in the wasteland.

tiles.name: recycled_housing_block
tiles.description: Housing built from recycled materials, a sign of the city's commitment to sustainability.

tiles.name: autonomous_logistics_center
tiles.description: A highly automated center for sorting and distributing goods throughout the region.

tiles.name: entertainment_dome_district
tiles.description: Domed districts dedicated to virtual reality and other immersive entertainment experiences.

tiles.name: corporate_research_park
tiles.description: A cluster of research facilities focused on advanced technologies, shrouded in secrecy.

tiles.name: scrubland_rock_outcrops
tiles.description: Scattered rock outcrops, offering vantage points and shelter from the harsh sun.

tiles.name: underground_aquifer_taps
tiles.description: Secret taps into underground aquifers, a source of water for those who dare to steal it.

tiles.name: crimsonwing_training_grounds
tiles.description: Where the Crimsonwings hone their aerial skills and strategic thinking; KiraKira likely trained here.

tiles.name: black_market_water_trade
tiles.description: A hidden marketplace where water is traded illegally, a risky but lucrative endeavor.

tiles.name: decontamination_zone
tiles.description: A sterile zone designed to remove toxins from people and equipment entering the city.

tiles.name: mutant_creature_habitat
tiles.description: A desolate region where mutant creatures roam, a consequence of the city's pollution.

tiles.name: verti_farm_sky_gardens
tiles.description: Vertical farms attached to skyscrapers, providing fresh produce for the city's elite.

tiles.name: automated_freight_drone_hub
tiles.description: A high-traffic area where freight drones deliver goods to businesses and residents.

tiles.name: high_speed_maglev_station
tiles.description: A transportation hub where high-speed maglev trains connect to distant cities.

tiles.name: arcology_living_quarter
tiles.description: A self-contained living quarter within a massive arcology, providing everything residents need.

tiles.name: desert_wash_creek
tiles.description: A seasonal creek bed, providing a temporary oasis for wildlife after rare rainfalls.

tiles.name: abandoned_irrigation_system
tiles.description: The remains of an irrigation system, a failed attempt to cultivate the arid land.

tiles.name: avian_clan_observatory
tiles.description: A high vantage point used by avian clans to observe the surrounding territory and track movements.

tiles.name: contaminated_groundwater_source
tiles.description: A source of contaminated groundwater, a health hazard for those who rely on it.

tiles.name: reclamation_process_center
tiles.description: A facility focused on reclaiming valuable resources from the city's waste stream.

tiles.name: outcast_settlement_edge
tiles.description: The edge of a settlement for outcasts and refugees, struggling to survive on the fringes of society.

tiles.name: bio_dome_experimental_site
tiles.description: An experimental site for growing food in a controlled environment, part of the city's sustainability efforts.

tiles.name: autonomous_taxi_network
tiles.description: A transportation network of autonomous taxis, providing convenient transportation within the city.

tiles.name: theatrical_virtual_reality_arcade
tiles.description: A district where residents can explore virtual worlds and experience simulated adventures.

tiles.name: university_research_labs
tiles.description: A hub for scientific research and technological innovation, driving the city's economy.

tiles.name: thorny_scrub_patch
tiles.description: A dense patch of thorny scrub, providing refuge for small animals but difficult to navigate.

tiles.name: derelict_comm_relay_station
tiles.description: An abandoned communications relay station, a relic of a bygone era.

tiles.name: the_great_avian_nesting_site
tiles.description: A protected nesting site for various avian species, a symbol of the scrubland's natural heritage.

tiles.name: underground_sewer_access
tiles.description: A dangerous access point to the city's underground sewer system, a haven for criminals and outcasts.

tiles.name: chemical_processing_facility
tiles.description: A facility that processes chemical waste from the city, releasing potentially harmful emissions.

tiles.name: outcast_settlement_market
tiles.description: A bustling marketplace where outcasts trade goods and services, a community of survivors.

tiles.name: vertical_hydroponics_system
tiles.description: A system for growing plants without soil, a sustainable way to produce food in the city.

tiles.name: railway_freight_yard
tiles.description: A large railway yard where goods are transferred between trains and trucks.

tiles.name: hologram_projection_district
tiles.description: Where the City projects vibrant 3d advertisements across entire districts.

tiles.name: advanced_robotics_factory
tiles.description: A cutting-edge factory that produces robots for various industries, driving the city's technological advancement.

tiles.name: sun_baked_mesa
tiles.description: A flat mesa baked by the desert sun, offering a panoramic view of the surrounding landscape.

tiles.name: eroded_cliffside
tiles.description: A steep cliffside eroded by wind and rain, a dangerous but scenic location.

tiles.name: avian_ancient_ruins
tiles.description: Ruins of structures built by avian clans long ago, a reminder of their rich history.

tiles.name: contaminated_groundwater_lake
tiles.description: A body of stagnant groundwater, a breeding ground for disease and environmental hazards.

tiles.name: metal_salvage_yard
tiles.description: Area where metals are melted down in a chaotic melting facility; scavenged metal is melted down and reformed into new items.

tiles.name: refugee_camp_outer_edge
tiles.description: The outer reaches of the Refugee Camp, living in tents and converted cars.

tiles.name: algae_purification_ponds
tiles.description: The Ponds filter and purify water using algae.

tiles.name: automated_highway_interchange
tiles.description: A complex network of highways all managed by Automated Systems.

tiles.name: VR_arena
tiles.description: The virtual reality arena where users compete using real-world hardware and virtual landscapes.

tiles.name: Data_Harvesting_Center
tiles.description: Where personal data is collected and sold.

tiles.name: Overlook Cliffside
tiles.description: The best place to view the entire city below.

tiles.name: Desert_Road
tiles.description: A deserted area that has had roads built on it at one point.

tiles.name: The_Great_Chasm
tiles.description: A large, 100-foot-wide chasm runs through this part of the city.

tiles.name: The_Forgotten_Ruins
tiles.description: A part of the city that has been abandoned due to toxic materials being released.

tiles.name: Waste_Processing_Plant
tiles.description: The location of where waste is broken down and repurposed into building materials.

tiles.name: The_Ghetto
tiles.description: Where people of little means are forced to live.

tiles.name: Hydroponic_Farms
tiles.description: Where food is produced year-round using water and light, no land.

tiles.name: Rail_Depot
tiles.description: The rail depot for transports that are going long distance.

tiles.name: entertainment_district
tiles.description: Where people spend money for entertainment purposes.

tiles.name: City_College
tiles.description: The center of all city education.

tiles.name: The_Badlands
tiles.description: Where bandits and rouges live.

tiles.name: Old_Road
tiles.description: An old broken road with debris throughout.

tiles.name: Tunnel_Entrance
tiles.description: A hole in the side of the mountain with a tunnel running through.

tiles.name: Abandoned_Town
tiles.description: A city that had to be abandoned due to toxic levels.

tiles.name: Industrial_district
tiles.description: Factories, warehouses and plants.

tiles.name: Low_Income_Housing
tiles.description: Where the city's poor spend their lives.

tiles.name: Fish_Farms
tiles.description: Farms where fish are bread in an indoor setting.

tiles.name: Highway_Check_Point
tiles.description: Vehicles checked for what they are carrying on the automated highway.

tiles.name: The_Theater
tiles.description: A place where holograms are created.

tiles.name: Goverment_Offices
tiles.description: Where all official buisness is preformed.
